mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Quest(BoardNo,Title,Context,Writer, SavedFilePath, RealFilePath) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{title}, #{context}, #{writer}, #{savedFilePath}, #{realFilePath});
INSERT INTO QPicture(QuestNo, SavedFilePath, RealFilePath, Writer) VALUES (#{questNo}, #{savedFilePath}, #{realFilePath}, #{writer} );
mapper.select: SELECT QuestNo, BoardNo, Title, Context, RegDate, Writer, ViewCount, GoodCount, Deleted, SavedFilePath, RealFilePath FROM Quest ORDER BY QuestNo DESC
SELECT QPictureNo, SavedFilePath, RealFilePath, RegDate, QuestNo FROM QPicture
SELECT BOARDNO, QUESTNO, TITLE, CONTEXT, REGDATE, WRITER, VIEWCOUNT, GOODCOUNT, DELETED FROM QUEST
SELECT BoardNo,QuestNo,Title,Context,RegDate,Writer,ViewCount,GoodCount,Deleted FROM Quest WHERE Deleted =0 ORDER BY RegDate DESC LIMIT #{ start }, #{ end };
